name: You Are The Slime! (Alpha)
description:
A slime comes across a band of humans! Devour the humans!

Arrow Keys = Move

Space bar = Absorb

Select between mashing spacebar to absorb enemies or just moving over them.

WEB VERSION HAS NO LIGHTING.

Made for Ludum Dare 33 by @SecularBaron

Tree and grass tile by:

http://opengameart.org/users/adebgamesoft

Sounds by:

https://freesound.org/people/StephenSaldanha/

https://freesound.org/people/DrMinky/
